channel.title: pulsar-components on Pulsar Neighborhood
channel.description: Recent content in pulsar-components on Pulsar Neighborhood

item.title: [Video] Apache Bookkeeper and Apache Zookeeper for Apache Pulsar
item.description: Enrico Olivelli speaks to the Japan Apache Pulsar User Group about how Apache Pulsar uses Apache ZooKeeper and Apache BookKeeper, with a particular focus on how Pulsar guarantees consistency even in spite of common failures in distributed systems.

item.title: [Video] Apache Pulsar Deep Dive an End-to-End View of the Data Flow
item.description: Enrico Olivelli gives us a tour of how data moves from the Producer to the Consumer.
